first_para: John Sampson Macfarlane Leech (born 11 April 1971, Hastings, East Sussex) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Manchester Withington since 2005. In the 2005–2010 Parliament he was a member of the Transport Select Committee and was appointed a Shadow Transport Spokesperson in 2006.

full.extract:
John Sampson Macfarlane Leech (born 11 April 1971, Hastings, East Sussex) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Manchester Withington since 2005. In the 2005–2010 Parliament he was a member of the Transport Select Committee and was appointed a Shadow Transport Spokesperson in 2006.
^ http://www.parliament.uk/brefing-papers/RP10-33.pdf
^ "John Leech". BBC. Retrieved 2007-10-02.
full.title: John Leech (politician)
